title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.74 - Ulster Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.74 - Ulster Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as Ulster Correctional Facility, which shall be located
in the Town of Wawarsing, Ulster County, New York. (b) Ulster Correctional Facility shall be
classified as a medium security correctional facility to be used for the
following purposes: (1)
general confinement
facility for males 18 years of age or older; (2)
detention center; (3)
reception center for males between 18 and
21 years of age at the time of sentencing; and
(4)
reception center for males 21 years of
age or older. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
100.74

Amended

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
